Controller

Class EntranceParkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.EntranceParkController

  • public class EntranceParkController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for logic of enter&exit park. include creating a casual traveler. updates by enter time and exit time of traveler(including with order & without order). updates the numbers of travelers in the park.
    Version:
    2.0 Build December, 2020
    Author:
    Liad Yadin

    • Method Detail

      • enterWithoutOrder

        public void enterWithoutOrder(java.time.LocalTime timeOfVisit,
                              java.time.LocalDate dateOfVisit,
                              java.lang.String wantedPark,
                              int numOfVisitors,
                              float price)
        this method sends to server details of a casual traveler for insert this traveler to travellerInPark table in DB using by TravellerInPark entity in Logic source folder for helping
        Parameters:
        timeOfVisit - - current time - a casual traveler come at this moment to the park
        dateOfVisit - - current date
        wantedPark - - the park that this traveler chose to enter
        numOfVisitors - - the number of visitors that came with this traveler to the park
        price - - total price

      • setNumOfVisitorEntringPark

        public void setNumOfVisitorEntringPark(java.lang.String wantedpark,
                                       int numOfVisitors)
        this method sends to server the right number of visitors that enter/exit from the park for updates the value of the current unexpected visitors in park
        Parameters:
        wantedpark - - the park that we want to change the amount of visitors
        numOfVisitors - - amount we want to add or sub
